General.Name: Emmerson PLC
General.Description: Emmerson PLC engages in the exploration and development of a potash development project in Morocco. Its flagship property is the Khemisset potash project located in northern Morocco. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Douglas, Isle of Man.
General.Address: 55 Athol Street, Douglas, Isle of Man, IM1 1LA

1.Name: Dr. Robert  Wrixon B.Eng(Hons), Chem.Eng, GAICD, Min.Eng, Ph.D.
1.Title: Exec. Director
